decentralize.translation[0].definitions[: to move parts of a government, organization etc from a central place to several different smaller ones
Many firms are decentralizing their operations.
decentralize.translation[1].definitions[: if a large company, organization, or industry decentralizes or is decentralized, responsibility, services, or jobs are moved away from a central place to several different smaller places
There may be a need to decentralize and set up semi-autonomous subsidiaries.
As a result, most companies attempted to decentralize parts of their IT operations.
